plot: Niki, an employee at a cosmetics shop, wants to have a child. Driving back home one night, she runs over a little girl. Although innocent, Niki now has to deal with the "unbearable".
title: Kato apo to maquillage sou
plot_es: Niki, an employee at a cosmetics shop, wants to have a child. Driving back home one night, she runs over a little girl. Although innocent, Niki now has to deal with the "unbearable".
plot_en: Niki, an employee at a cosmetics shop, wants to have a child. Driving back home one night, she runs over a little girl. Although innocent, Niki now has to deal with the "unbearable".
